comments.en:
Driver for the Canon LBP-810 and LBP-1120 laser winprinters. Should also work with other printers using the CAPT protocol, please report if you have a printer working with this driver which is not listed here.

Note that the driver talks directly to the USB port. So the printer must be connected via USB. The output destination specified in the printer spooler will not be used. If you use CUPS, set the destination to /dev/null, so that the CUPS backends do not block the USB device.

The Foomatic PPD files for this driver are not available on OpenPrinting because they are already contained in the driver package.
